document_data.name: Lomaraj
document_data.mainbody: '''Lomaraj''' was a [[human]] settlement in the [[Pasocada Basin]] in [[Maztica]].
document_data.Geography: The town was located on the Pasocada River a few miles downriver from the Raven Falls and [[Great Raven Pueblo]], an [[Azuposi]] settlement. Lomaraj was a center of trade between the two peoples.
document_data.Inhabitants: Lomaraj was the largest [[Metahel]] settlement with a population of around one thousand people.
